mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (schedule_id, seat_grade_id, user_id, seat_number, created_at, status) VALUES (#{seatDto.scheduleId}, #{seatDto.seatGradeId}, #{userId}, #{seatDto.seatId}, #{currentTime}, "RESERVATION")
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT created_at) FROM reservations WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId} AND user_id = #{userId}) < (SELECT reservation_limit FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS result;
